people.name: Denji
people.description: The main character of the series. Denji is a half devil hybrid made up of his best friend Pochita the chainsaw devil's heart. (EDIT)

people.name: Power
people.description: The most powerful blood fiend ever!

devils.name: Pochita
devils.description: Pochita is the Chainsaw Devil, the devil feared most by other devils. He was gravely injured in a battle against the four horsemen of the apocalypse, after which he was saved and befriended by Denji. After Denji died Pochita became his heart, making the two become chainsaw man

locations.name: The Human World
locations.description: The human world, also known as earth is the land where human's are from. This is modern day earth, but its  history is a little different than ours. When a devil dies in hell it is reborn in the human world, and when it dies in the human world it returns to hell
